<#ARRAY [0..STATE:COUNT]#>
        private static class ComponentInstaller
        {
            private static bool _isNoInstalled = true;

            public static void Install()
            {
                if (_isNoInstalled)
                {
                    _isNoInstalled = false;
                    InstallInternal();
                }
            }

            private static void InstallInternal()
            {
---<#ARRAY [0..COMPONENT:COUNT]#>
                ComponentGlobalRegister<<#STATE:GEN_NAME#>>.Install<<#COMPONENT:FULL_NAME#>>();
---<#END#>
            }
        }
<#END#>
